name: Ecclesia (Herminee)
description:
Here is a study project done as part of a college exercise. 

The theme of this game is about Uchrony. We imagined a world where electricity had appeared in the early Middle Ages, and imagined what that world might look like. 

Thus, Christianity does not exist anymore, it is replaced  by a strange cult of science ready to sacrifice everything (including its humanity) to allow science to evolve.

By Hermine and FabulousGordon
